languages.text: "Не обманись, эттфатер. Он умеет убедительно говорить, но прежде, чем я увижу кровавые трофеи, доказывающие его доблесть и верность, я не повернусь к нему спиной".

traits.locale_text: "Не обманись, тан. Он умеет убедительно говорить, но прежде, чем я увижу кровавые трофеи, доказывающие его доблесть и верность, я не повернусь к нему спиной".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."
languages.original_text: "Не обманись, эттфатер. Он умеет убедительно говорить, но прежде, чем я увижу кровавые трофеи, доказывающие его доблесть и верность, я не повернусь к нему спиной".

traits.locale_text: "Do not be taken in, Thegin. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not be taken in, Thegin. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not be taken in, Thegin. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No se deje engañar, Aett-Vater. Sus palabras son convincentes, pero hasta que vea los trofeos de sangre que demuestran su valor y su lealtad, no le daré la espalda».
languages.original_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."

traits.locale_text: «No se deje engañar, Aett-Vater. Sus palabras son convincentes, pero hasta que vea los trofeos de sangre que demuestran su valor y su lealtad, no le daré la espalda».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “别上他的当，狼领。他的话很有说服力，但除非我看到他手中沾着鲜血的战利品，证明他的英勇与忠诚，否则我是绝不会相信他的。”
languages.original_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."

traits.locale_text: “别上他的当，狼领。他的话很有说服力，但除非我看到他手中沾着鲜血的战利品，证明他的英勇与忠诚，否则我是绝不会相信他的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「騙されるな、アエット＝ヴァテル。やつの言葉には説得力があるが、やつの勇気と忠誠心を証明する血の戦利品を見るまでは、俺は絶対に油断しない」
languages.original_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."

traits.locale_text: 「騙されるな、アエット＝ヴァテル。やつの言葉には説得力があるが、やつの勇気と忠誠心を証明する血の戦利品を見るまでは、俺は絶対に油断しない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Méfiez-vous de lui, aett-vater. Il sait se montrer persuasif, mais en ce qui me concerne, je ne lui tournerai pas le dos avant d'avoir vu les trophées de sang attestant sa valeur et sa loyauté. »
languages.original_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."

traits.locale_text: « Méfiez-vous de lui, aett-vater. Il sait se montrer persuasif, mais en ce qui me concerne, je ne lui tournerai pas le dos avant d'avoir vu les trophées de sang attestant sa valeur et sa loyauté. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Lasst Euch nicht vereinnahmen, Aett-Vater. Seine Worte sind überzeugen, doch bis ich die Bluttrophäen sehe, die seine Tugend und Loyalität beweisen, kehre ich ihm nicht den Rücken zu."
languages.original_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euch nicht vereinnahmen, Aett-Vater. Seine Worte sind überzeugen, doch bis ich die Bluttrophäen sehe, die seine Tugend und Loyalität beweisen, kehre ich ihm nicht den Rücken zu."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."

languages.text: "Ona inanma Aett-Vater. Lafları ikna edici olabilir ama cesaretini ve bağlılığını kanıtlayan kan ganimetlerini görene kadar ona sırtımı dayayamam."
languages.original_text: "Do not be taken in, Aett-Vater. His words are persuasive, but until I see the blood trophies that prove his valour and loyalty, I will not be putting my back to him."

traits.locale_text: "Ona inanma Aett-Vater. Lafları ikna edicidir ama cesaretini ve bağlılığını kanıtlayan kan ganimetlerini görene kadar ona sırtımı dayayamam."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
